name: Project Shield
summary: Welcome to a new simulator called Project Shield, here you will enter a simulation where you must fend for your life. It is you against your endurance, your friends, and your enemies. Enjoy a fast paced simulation in which you will be protecting yourself with nothing more than the provided shield. You can face-off against your friends with the local multi-player feature where you take turns seeing who can survive the longest. Whether you are looking to see how you match up against your friends, against people around the world, or just solely want beat your own record Project Shield provides a great re-playable experience for all ages.
